segments.text: I'm coming to pick up my ticket . This is my reservation note .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your reservation is right . Please get a ticket booking form from there and fill it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . How much is the ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Surely of course . Give me your card please .
segments.speaker: S2
